DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate clinical outcome on patients who undergo cementless 4th generation ceramic (BIOLOXÂ®delta, CeramTec GmbH, Plochingen, Germany) on ceramic (CoC) bearing total hip aArthroplasty ("THA") in patients younger than 30 years.
DOC.brief_title: Alumina Matrix Composite Ceramic Bearing Total Hip Arthroplasty in Patients Younger Than 30 Years
DOC.criteria: younger than 30 years advanced hip disease older than 30 years
